    Method
    Description
    static DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager>
    DatabaseManager.multiDatabases()
    Creates a new DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager> instance that will create a new database on each call to getDatabaseInfo().
    static DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager>
    DatabaseManager.singleDatabase()
    Creates a new DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager> instance that will return a connection to the same database on each call to getDatabaseInfo().
